trans-unit.source: Configuration overview
trans-unit.target: Configuration overview

trans-unit.source: The steps for this task use a VNet based on the values below.
trans-unit.target: The steps for this task use a VNet based on the values below.

trans-unit.source: Additional settings and names are also outlined in this list.
trans-unit.target: Additional settings and names are also outlined in this list.

trans-unit.source: We don't use this list directly in any of the steps, although we do add variables based on the values in this list.
trans-unit.target: We don't use this list directly in any of the steps, although we do add variables based on the values in this list.

trans-unit.source: You can copy the list to use as a reference, replacing the values with your own.
trans-unit.target: You can copy the list to use as a reference, replacing the values with your own.

trans-unit.source: Configuration reference list:
trans-unit.target: Configuration reference list:

trans-unit.source: Virtual Network Name = "TestVNet"
trans-unit.target: Virtual Network Name = "TestVNet"

trans-unit.source: Virtual Network address space = 192.168.0.0/16
trans-unit.target: Virtual Network address space = 192.168.0.0/16

trans-unit.source: Resource Group = "TestRG"
trans-unit.target: Resource Group = "TestRG"

trans-unit.source: Subnet1 Name = "FrontEnd"
trans-unit.target: Subnet1 Name = "FrontEnd"

trans-unit.source: Subnet1 address space = "192.168.0.0/16"
trans-unit.target: Subnet1 address space = "192.168.0.0/16"

trans-unit.source: Gateway Subnet name: "GatewaySubnet" You must always name a gateway subnet *GatewaySubnet*.
trans-unit.target: Gateway Subnet name: "GatewaySubnet" You must always name a gateway subnet *GatewaySubnet*.

trans-unit.source: Gateway Subnet address space = "192.168.200.0/26"
trans-unit.target: Gateway Subnet address space = "192.168.200.0/26"

trans-unit.source: Region = "East US"
trans-unit.target: Region = "East US"

trans-unit.source: Gateway Name = "GW"
trans-unit.target: Gateway Name = "GW"

trans-unit.source: Gateway IP Name = "GWIP"
trans-unit.target: Gateway IP Name = "GWIP"

trans-unit.source: Gateway IP configuration Name = "gwipconf"
trans-unit.target: Gateway IP configuration Name = "gwipconf"

trans-unit.source: VPN Type = "ExpressRoute" This VPN type is required for an ExpressRoute configuration.
trans-unit.target: VPN Type = "ExpressRoute" This VPN type is required for an ExpressRoute configuration.

trans-unit.source: Gateway Public IP Name = "gwpip"
trans-unit.target: Gateway Public IP Name = "gwpip"

trans-unit.source: Add a gateway
trans-unit.target: Add a gateway

trans-unit.source: Connect to your Azure Subscription.
trans-unit.target: Connect to your Azure Subscription.

trans-unit.source: Declare your variables for this exercise.
trans-unit.target: Declare your variables for this exercise.

trans-unit.source: This example will use the use the variables in the sample below.
trans-unit.target: This example will use the use the variables in the sample below.

trans-unit.source: Be sure to edit this to reflect the settings that you want to use.
trans-unit.target: Be sure to edit this to reflect the settings that you want to use.

trans-unit.source: Store the virtual network object as a variable.
trans-unit.target: Store the virtual network object as a variable.

trans-unit.source: Add a gateway subnet to your Virtual Network.
trans-unit.target: Add a gateway subnet to your Virtual Network.

trans-unit.source: The gateway subnet must be named "GatewaySubnet".
trans-unit.target: The gateway subnet must be named "GatewaySubnet".

trans-unit.source: You'll want to create a gateway that is /27 or larger (/26, /25, etc.).
trans-unit.target: You'll want to create a gateway that is /27 or larger (/26, /25, etc.).

trans-unit.source: Set the configuration.
trans-unit.target: Set the configuration.

trans-unit.source: Store the gateway subnet as a variable.
trans-unit.target: Store the gateway subnet as a variable.

trans-unit.source: Request a public IP address.
trans-unit.target: Request a public IP address.

trans-unit.source: The IP address is requested before creating the gateway.
trans-unit.target: The IP address is requested before creating the gateway.

trans-unit.source: You cannot specify the IP address that you want to use; it’s dynamically allocated.
trans-unit.target: You cannot specify the IP address that you want to use; it’s dynamically allocated.

trans-unit.source: You'll use this IP address in the next configuration section.
trans-unit.target: You'll use this IP address in the next configuration section.

trans-unit.source: The AllocationMethod must be Dynamic.
trans-unit.target: The AllocationMethod must be Dynamic.

trans-unit.source: Create the configuration for your gateway.
trans-unit.target: Create the configuration for your gateway.

trans-unit.source: The gateway configuration defines the subnet and the public IP address to use.
trans-unit.target: The gateway configuration defines the subnet and the public IP address to use.

trans-unit.source: In this step, you are specifying the configuration that will be used when you create the gateway.
trans-unit.target: In this step, you are specifying the configuration that will be used when you create the gateway.

trans-unit.source: This step does not actually create the gateway object.
trans-unit.target: This step does not actually create the gateway object.

trans-unit.source: Use the sample below to create your gateway configuration.
trans-unit.target: Use the sample below to create your gateway configuration.

trans-unit.source: Create the gateway.
trans-unit.target: Create the gateway.

trans-unit.source: In this step, the **-GatewayType** is especially important.
trans-unit.target: In this step, the **-GatewayType** is especially important.

trans-unit.source: You must use the value **ExpressRoute**.
trans-unit.target: You must use the value **ExpressRoute**.

trans-unit.source: Note that after running these cmdlets, the gateway can take 20 minutes or more to create.
trans-unit.target: Note that after running these cmdlets, the gateway can take 20 minutes or more to create.
